CXR2715.Texto: Heart size and mediastinal contour are normal. Pulmonary vascularity is normal. There is a 9 mm right lower lobe pulmonary nodule, not seen on prior exams. There are posttraumatic deformities of the right posterior ribs. No focal airspace consolidation or effusion. No pneumothorax.

Utterance.PhraseText: No focal airspace consolidation or effusion.
There are posttraumatic deformities of the right posterior ribs.
Heart size and mediastinal contour are normal.
There is a 9 mm right lower lobe pulmonary nodule, not seen on prior exams.
